title: Joe Biden plans to issue multiple executive orders upon transition into White House
description: President-elect Joe Biden plans on issuing multiple executive orders upon transitioning into the White House. NBC News’ Mike Memoli reports on Biden’s policy plans including a Covid-19 task force.

title: Much of the Republican Party hedges on accepting election results

author: MSNBC.com
title: Covid-19 vaccine 90 percent effective in first analysis, Pfizer says
description: The drug company Pfizer said Monday that early analysis showed its candidate for Covid-19 is more than 90 percent effective in preventing infection.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Why now is the time to bring the country together
description: The panel discusses Joe Biden's win in the 2020 election and why now -- given Trump got more than 70 million votes -- isn't the time for Democrats to gloat but to work together with Republicans in uniting the country.
source.name: MSNBC

author: Steve Benen
title: Team Trump's Four Seasons Fiasco will be tough to forget
description: The important parts of a press conference are usually its participants and their comments. Once in a while, though, the location is what matters.
content:
Ordinarily, the important parts of a press conference are its participants and their comments. But every once in a while, the location of a press conference is what stands out.

title: Parts of the world reacted like the US 'had overthrown a dictator'

title: Virginia Democrat wins re-election in House race
description: Rep. Abigail Spanberger, D-Va., beat Republican challenger Nick Freitas, winning re-election in a tight House race. Rep. Spanberger joins Morning Joe to discuss.

author: MSNBC.com
title: ‘We’ve got this, we can do this’: Fair Fight Action CEO on Georgia runoffs
description: The fate of the U.S. Senate majority will likely come down to two runoffs in Georgia. Fair Fight Action CEO Lauren Groh-Wargo joins Stephanie Ruhle to explain why money pouring in from across the country isn’t all the candidates need.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Fox News cuts away from McEnany's baseless claims of voter fraud
description: Fox News anchor Neil Cavuto cut away from White House Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany as she spoke at a press conference on behalf of President Trump, making claims, without evidence, that illegal votes had been cast in the presidential election.
